content.text:
# List of saints canonized in the 20th century

List of saints canonized in the 20th century (1901–2000) are people who have received recognition as saints through canonization by the following popes of the Roman Catholic Church:
* Pope Pius XI (1922–1939)
* Pope Pius XII (1939–1958)
* Pope John XXIII (1958–1963)
* Pope Paul VI (1963–1978)
* Pope John Paul II (1978–2005)
